pull.title: rpc: Add testblocktemplatevalidity
pull.body: A caller can check if a block template is valid and is good to spend work on

events.body: TODO: Add tests (Currently left out to avoid excessive merge conflicts with other pull requests touching the miner tests)

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->Note to reviewers: This pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #13945 (Refactoring CRPCCommand with enum category by isghe)
* #13864 (validation: Document where we are intentionally ignoring bool return values from validation related functions by practicalswift)
* #13083 (Add compile time checking for cs_main runtime locking assertions by practicalswift)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
This is already supported via BIP 23 Block Proposals: https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/blob/master/bip-0023.mediawiki#Block_Proposal

Right, looks like this is already implemented
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/56f69360dc98bd68704f19646a84d045788d199e/src/rpc/mining.cpp#L389-L416
